com.example.zhaorui.dvdcollector.Controller

Class DVDController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.zhaorui.dvdcollector.Controller.DVDController

  • public class DVDController
extends java.lang.Object

    The DVDController controls information collected for DVD by providing function to create new DVD, load information from existing DVD.

    See Also:
    ArrayList
